availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Springfield (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Son of William Springfield and Elizabeth Springfield. Father of Geneva Springfield, Mary B. Springfield, and Mildred W. Springfield. Married to Cynthia Springfield. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 151B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 652.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 4, p. 233A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 154.
"J. H. Springfield (1827-1904)," Find A Grave, Memorial #20840936, accessed November 9, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/20840936.
